content: hour i gently squeezed out excess water then rolled it in a large beach towel and squeezed out even more water then i laid it flat to dry i didn t use any pins to block this i just let it air dry if you used an acrylic yarn you can still block it the same way i did it just may not retain it s shape progress/tutorial photos every effort has been made to make sure this pattern is as error-free as i could make it but there could be typos and other mistakes in it i apologize for those in advance you may share this pattern but please support the designer by not selling the finished product from this design copyright 2020 christie pruitt
